lamparski.areabase.map_support

Class OrdnanceSurveyMapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • WebView
      • lamparski.areabase.map_support.OrdnanceSurveyMapView

  • A custom WebView that loads a local copy of the Ordnance Survey map, and then provides an interface so that the map can be interacted with from Areabase.

    OS has a lot of data about the UK, so it'd be silly not to use it. Nevertheless, it takes extra effort to get it running.

    Author:
    filip
